description: React component for a Scores page that interacts with a Supabase backend to display and add scores, including handling authentication, fetching data, and rendering a form and table.

methods.name: normalizeSupabaseError
methods.description: Normalizes error messages from Supabase to user-friendly messages.

methods.name: ensureAnonymousSession
methods.description: Attempts to sign in anonymously with Supabase if the method is available.

methods.name: fetchScores
methods.description: Fetches the latest 20 scores from the 'scores' table in Supabase.

methods.name: validate
methods.description: Validates form input fields for username, score, and level.

methods.name: onSubmit
methods.description: Handles form submission to add a new score to the database.
